meanings.definition: A type of exercise involving pushing a weight down from a raised position.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys doing pushdowns at the gym to strengthen her arms.
meanings.sent2: He added pushdowns to his workout routine for better muscle definition.
meanings.sent3: During the fitness class, they joked that pushdowns were the secret to super strength.
meanings.sent4: The motion of the machine mimics pushdowns, making it easier to understand the exercise.
meanings.sent5: The trainer demonstrated proper form for pushdowns to prevent injuries.

meanings.definition: The act of pushing something down.
meanings.sent1: With a quick pushdown, the lid of the jar popped open.
meanings.sent2: His pushdown on the lever activated the machine.
meanings.sent3: The pushdown on the button turned on the light in the room.
meanings.sent4: She felt a sense of accomplishment with each pushdown of the plunger.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown of the handle released the trapdoor with a loud click.

meanings.definition: A type of mechanical device used to push objects downward.
meanings.sent1: The engineer designed a new pushdown for the assembly line.
meanings.sent2: The pushdown in the factory helped streamline the production process.
meanings.sent3: The pushdown malfunctioned, causing a delay in the packaging line.
meanings.sent4: The robotic arm performed a precise pushdown on each item.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown mechanism ensured consistent pressure on the materials.
